name: Catching (itch) (Kitoxiko)
description:
Submission to Mini jam 127- Cats

Catching is a relaxing game where you play the role of an animal rescuer who saves kittens and finds them a loving forever home. It combines strategy, skill, patience and heart. It's the perfect game for animal lovers.

Made by:

  • Kiko
  • Martin
  • Maniu
  • Sam(Lovelysammy)

Controls & Rules:
